name: Sliming Forward
description:
Sliming Forward is a short Puzzle Game inspired by Sokoban-style games.

You play a cute little slime that can only move forward and fire a grappling hook to move sideways (and forward too) but is incapable of going backward. Your goal is to reach the finish line in each levels !

Controls : 

UP ARROW - Moving Forward

W - Firing the Grappling Hook in front of you

Q - Firing the Grappling Hook on your Left

D - Firing the Grappling Hook on your Right

M - Muting/Unmuting the Music

R - Restarting the Current Level, if you get stucked or bugged (did my best to remove most of them but they are still some bugs in the game)
